body:
All the time I've been alive everyone loved Adam Sandler because he's funny, and his movies were very popular.

The past couple weeks I've suddenly encountered a bunch of jokes about how bad Adam Sandler is. And how much his movies suck. It's prevalent enough that most don't seem to be woooshed by it, and apparently he's despised enough that his movies are worthy of being feared similar to Justin Bieber. I was surprised but sure enough even classics he starred in have terrible reviews now.

Does anyone know what prompted this? And does this mean people now hate other comedy actors like Chris Farley and David Spade too, or just Adam Sandler for some reason?

It's prevalent enough that most don't seem to be woooshed by it, and apparently he's despised enough that his movies are worthy of being feared similar to Justin Bieber. I was surprised but sure enough even classics he starred in have terrible reviews now.

Does anyone know what prompted this? And does this mean people now hate other comedy actors like Chris Farley and David Spade too, or just Adam Sandler for some reason?

body:
His own.

He owns the production company.
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Happy_Madison_Productions


That is what happened to Adam Sandler. He got so rich, he didn't need outside influences telling him what to do. And without constructive criticism his art dulled.

body: He's unapologetically phoning it in and by all accounts having a wonderful life in the process. People who value meritocracy find it galling that he can succeed making the same low-brow crap movie with no plot, just Adam Sandler wanting to hang out in a pleasant filming location and maybe star opposite (1) a less well known comic who won't upstage him, or (2) a hot chick.

post.body:
All the time I've been alive everyone loved Adam Sandler because he's funny, and his movies were very popular.

The past couple weeks I've suddenly encountered a bunch of jokes about how bad Adam Sandler is. And how much his movies suck. It's prevalent enough that most don't seem to be woooshed by it, and apparently he's despised enough that his movies are worthy of being feared similar to Justin Bieber. I was surprised but sure enough even classics he starred in have terrible reviews now.

Does anyone know what prompted this? And does this mean people now hate other comedy actors like Chris Farley and David Spade too, or just Adam Sandler for some reason?

parent.body: He's unapologetically phoning it in and by all accounts having a wonderful life in the process. People who value meritocracy find it galling that he can succeed making the same low-brow crap movie with no plot, just Adam Sandler wanting to hang out in a pleasant filming location and maybe star opposite (1) a less well known comic who won't upstage him, or (2) a hot chick.

post.body:
All the time I've been alive everyone loved Adam Sandler because he's funny, and his movies were very popular.

The past couple weeks I've suddenly encountered a bunch of jokes about how bad Adam Sandler is. And how much his movies suck. It's prevalent enough that most don't seem to be woooshed by it, and apparently he's despised enough that his movies are worthy of being feared similar to Justin Bieber. I was surprised but sure enough even classics he starred in have terrible reviews now.

Does anyone know what prompted this? And does this mean people now hate other comedy actors like Chris Farley and David Spade too, or just Adam Sandler for some reason?

parent.body:
I've seen a lot of his older movies. I haven't seen any of his newer ones, I didn't even know he was still making them.

But it's actually the older ones that get shit on a lot. I see things like Happy Gilmore, Billy Madison, Grown Ups, and The Waterboy come up frequently.

post.body:
All the time I've been alive everyone loved Adam Sandler because he's funny, and his movies were very popular.

The past couple weeks I've suddenly encountered a bunch of jokes about how bad Adam Sandler is. And how much his movies suck. It's prevalent enough that most don't seem to be woooshed by it, and apparently he's despised enough that his movies are worthy of being feared similar to Justin Bieber. I was surprised but sure enough even classics he starred in have terrible reviews now.

Does anyone know what prompted this? And does this mean people now hate other comedy actors like Chris Farley and David Spade too, or just Adam Sandler for some reason?

post.body:
All the time I've been alive everyone loved Adam Sandler because he's funny, and his movies were very popular.

The past couple weeks I've suddenly encountered a bunch of jokes about how bad Adam Sandler is. And how much his movies suck. It's prevalent enough that most don't seem to be woooshed by it, and apparently he's despised enough that his movies are worthy of being feared similar to Justin Bieber. I was surprised but sure enough even classics he starred in have terrible reviews now.

Does anyone know what prompted this? And does this mean people now hate other comedy actors like Chris Farley and David Spade too, or just Adam Sandler for some reason?

post.body:
All the time I've been alive everyone loved Adam Sandler because he's funny, and his movies were very popular.

The past couple weeks I've suddenly encountered a bunch of jokes about how bad Adam Sandler is. And how much his movies suck. It's prevalent enough that most don't seem to be woooshed by it, and apparently he's despised enough that his movies are worthy of being feared similar to Justin Bieber. I was surprised but sure enough even classics he starred in have terrible reviews now.

Does anyone know what prompted this? And does this mean people now hate other comedy actors like Chris Farley and David Spade too, or just Adam Sandler for some reason?
